name: Sweet Horror
description:
This game is sweet and horror. You must collect in every level some sweets. Avoid to touch the creatures there, you lose a life! There are nine levels.

With w,a,s,d you move, with space-bar you turn back. with c you crouch, it is specially for the first level important.

The graphics are by soi, zealous, teamjoker, dungeon mason.

The music is by disembodied imagination.

This game is for the "cute yet creepy jam"
